title: Quoter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use the ability from a quoted role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Quoted role means any role that is directly mentioned during the day. Rule 17 does not apply, but roles you mention don't count.
- Every day, you must make a new role based off a message or group of messages sent in the day chat. Failure to do so will modkill you. The message(s) it's based off of must be included in the flavor text.

desc:
Post 3819
*"Is there a role that forces you to make roles using quotes from day chat?" - penguin*
